homeHeader.title: From Wealth Protection to Global Expansion, Get It All with One Nexuz JAFZA Offshore Company Setup Services
homeHeader.description: Tired of limited investment options that restrict your global reach? Invest in lucrative properties, fast-growing global markets, and first-class infrastructure by setting up in JAFZA Offshore. With 100% foreign ownership, 0% tax, and high international credibility, the region is the go-to setup for global investors.

leftSection_1.title: Why Choose JAFZA Offshore for Business Growth
leftSection_1.description: Trusted by thousands, JAFZA offshore provides foreign investors the opportunity to run their business remotely across borders.

items.description: Frustrated with equity-sharing rules? Say goodbye to the hassle of finding a local sponsor or shareholder and get full strategic control of your JAFZA offshore company. Build, grow, and scale on your own terms without unnecessary restrictions.

items.title: Streamline Global Asset Management, Safeguard Your Wealth, & Minimise Compliance Risks
items.subTitle: Streamline Global Asset Management, Safeguard Your Wealth, & Minimise Compliance Risks
items.description: Concerned about safeguarding your assets for future generations? items.title: Open Global Bank Accounts, Transact in Multi-Currencies & Gain Full Financial Flexibility

leftSection_5.title: Our 6-Step Process for  JAFZA Offshore Business Setup

items.title: Schedule a Free Strategy Call
items.description: We begin by understanding your objectives — from wealth protection to global expansion — and guide you on the most effective Jebel Ali offshore model and ownership setup.

items.title: Work With a Dedicated Registered Agent
items.description: Your appointed JAFZA-approved agent in Dubai becomes your on-ground partner, streamlining company setup, managing paperwork, and ensuring you meet every regulatory requirement.

items.title: Compile & File Your Application
items.description: Our team assists in preparing all essential documentation — MOA, AOA, shareholder details, passport copies, and business plans where needed — and files them with JAFZA for swift processing.

items.title: Obtain Your Incorporation Package
items.description: Once done, you’ll receive the full set of official documents — including Certificate of Incorporation, Share Certificates, and Board Resolutions — confirming your company’s offshore status.

items.title: Set Up Your Offshore Bank Account
items.description: We connect you with reliable banking partners and fast-track the account-opening process, giving you access to multi-currency accounts and secure global transactions.

items.title: Get Ongoing Consistent Support
items.description: Beyond incorporation, we offer continuous support for renewals, ownership changes, statutory records, and PRO services — keeping your Jebel Ali offshore company compliant and future-ready.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Do JAFZA offshore companies have to pay VAT in the UAE?
items.answer: JAFZA offshore companies are not required to pay corporate or personal tax. But the region has a 5% import tax.

items.question: What trade licenses are available in the JAFZA offshore zone?
items.answer: The Jebel Ali offshore offers numerous licenses, including industrial, innovation, logistics, service, and trade licenses.

items.question: Can I apply for a resident visa with my offshore company?
items.answer: No, JAFZA offshore companies cannot apply for a resident visa. However, our expert consultants can help you explore alternative visa options.

items.question: Can I own UAE property with my JAFZA offshore company?
items.answer: Yes, companies set in designated JAFZA offshore regions can own and sell properties.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help JAFZA offshore companies create a bank account?
items.answer: Yes, our specialists help you compare and create a local or global corporate bank account.
